document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    var calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar');
    var sortbyTime = '21:00 pm';
    calendar = new FullCalendar.Calendar(calendarEl, {
        year: 2025,
        month: 6,
        selectable: true,
        showNonCurrentDates: false,
        //dayMaxEvents: true,
        fixedWeekCount: false,
        eventOrder: "sortbyTime",
        validRange: function(nowDate) {
            return {
                start: nowDate
            };
        },
        events: all_events,
        eventColor: '',
        timeFormat: 'h:mm TT',
        eventContent: function(arg) {
            return {
                html: '<div class="fc-event-content-extension">' +
                    arg.event.extendedProps.imageUrl +
                    '<div class="tw-calendar-event-content"><div class="tw-calendar-event-title"  title="' +
                    arg.event.title + '">' + arg.event.title +
                    '</div><span class="tw-calendar-event-time">' +
                    arg.event.extendedProps.displayTime + '</span></div></div>'
            }
        },
        eventClick: function(calEvent, jsEvent, view) {
            jQuery.fancybox.open({
                src: calEvent.event.url,
                titlePosition: 'inside',
                titleShow: false,
                type: 'inline',
                scrolling: 'no',
                padding: '0',
                margin: '0',
                width: 640,
                height: 'auto',
                autoDimensions: true,
                hash: false,
                afterClose: function(instance, slide) {
                    var uri = window.location.toString();
                    if (uri.indexOf("#") > 0) {
                        var clean_uri = uri.substring(0, uri.indexOf("#"));
                        window.history.replaceState({}, document.title, clean_uri);
                    }
                },
            });
            return false;
        },
        eventRender: function(event, eventElement) {
            if (event.imageUrl) {
                eventElement.find('span.fc-event-title').before(jQuery(event.imageUrl));
            }
            if (event.title) {
                eventElement.attr('title', event.title);
            }
            if (event.venue) {
                //console.log(event.venue);
                eventElement.find('span.fc-event-title').after(jQuery(event.venue));
            }
            if (event.start) {
                eventElement.find("span.fc-event-time").prepend('Show: ');
            }
            if (event.doors) {
                eventElement.find("span.fc-event-time").prepend(
                    'Doors: <span style="text-transform: uppercase;">' + event.doors +
                    '</span><br />');
            }
        }
    });

    calendar.render();
    });

                var weekday = {};
                weekday['Sun'] = 'Sunday';
                weekday['Mon'] = 'Monday';
                weekday['Tue'] = 'Tuesday';
                weekday['Wed'] = 'Wednesday';
                weekday['Thu'] = 'Thursday';
                weekday['Fri'] = 'Friday';
                weekday['Sat'] = 'Saturday';
                var day = jQuery(this).text();
                jQuery(this).attr('aria-label','Calendar - '+ weekday[day]).attr('title', 'Calendar - '+ weekday[day]).attr('tabindex','0').attr('href', 'javascript:void(0)');
            });
            
            jQuery( 'a.fc-daygrid-day-number' ).each(function( index ) {
                var todaydate = jQuery(this).parents('td.fc-daygrid-day').attr('data-date');
                jQuery(this).attr('aria-label','Calendar '+ todaydate).attr('title', 'Calendar '+ todaydate).attr('tabindex','0').attr('href', 'javascript:void(0)');
            });
            
            jQuery('.fc-daygrid-dot-event').each(function( index ) {
                var time = jQuery(this).find('span.tw-calendar-event-time').text();
                var showtime = time.replace('Show: ', '');
                var todaydate = jQuery(this).parents('td.fc-daygrid-day').attr('data-date');
                var eventname = jQuery(this).find('div.tw-calendar-event-title').attr('title');
                jQuery(this).attr('aria-label',eventname+'|'+todaydate+'|'+showtime).attr('title', eventname+'|'+todaydate+'|'+showtime);
                jQuery(this).find('div.tw-artistcalendar-img img').attr('alt',eventname+'|'+todaydate+'|'+showtime);
            });
        });
